manipulators.description: F9 -> Switch audio output to 영현의 AirPods Pro
F9 -> Switch audio output to AUX
CAPS LOCK + tab to delete a char after
CAPS LOCK + backspace to delete word token
[CAPS LOCK + SPACE + Q] to top of page
[CAPS LOCK + SPACE + E] to end of page
Right command key to change lang
Right option key to change lang (for gk868)
